titles.title: I Will Enter His Gates (we will enter His gates)

comments.comment:
verse 3 (optional) chorus 3 (optional)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

properties.copyright: 1999 Thankyou Music, Administered by EMI Christian Music Publishing

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
I will enter His gates with
Thanksgiving in my heart
I will enter His courts With praise
I will say this is the day
That the LORD has made
I will rejoice for He Has made me glad

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
He has made me glad
He has made me glad
I will rejoice for He Has made me glad
(Repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We will enter His gates with
Thanksgiving in our hearts
We will enter His courts With praise
We will say this is the day
That the LORD has made
We will rejoice for He Has made us glad

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
He has made us glad
He has made us glad
We will rejoice for He Has made us glad
(Repeat)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We will enter Your gates with
Thanksgiving in our hearts
We will enter Your Courts With praise
We will say this is the day
That the LORD has made
We will rejoice for You Have made us glad

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
You have made us glad
You have made us glad
We will rejoice for You
Have made us glad
(Repeat)
